subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: It was a good game by the numbers for the Miami Heat’s LeBron James, but a low-scoring fourth quarter performance may have contributed to the Mavericks’ Game 5 win.
snippet: It was a good game by the numbers for the Miami Heat’s LeBron James, but a low-scoring fourth quarter performance may have contributed to the Mavericks’ Game 5 win.
